nodes.name: hasToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev checks if the sender is a game contract of the gambling hall.
@param _gameName Name of the game, in order to quickly verify the sender.
nodes.name: senderIsGame

nodes.documentation: @dev Opens the casino.
nodes.name: open

nodes.documentation: @dev Closes the casino.
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers tokens to the customer.
@param _customer the receiver of the tokens.
nodes.name: buyInternal

nodes.documentation:

@param _customer the buyer of the tokens.
nodes.name: cashoutInternal

nodes.documentation: @dev Payout to beneficiary.
nodes.name: payout

nodes.documentation: @dev has to be implemented by a casino to receive price...
nodes.name: tokenFallback

nodes.documentation: @dev To stock up ether. Send ether to the casino before producing more tokens.

nodes.name: payOutWin

@param _manager the manager's address.
